root.name: Microscopy Blocks
root.description: (Beta) Allows one to use various Micro Managers for Icy features inside Blocks plugin.
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 0.9.1.0 Date 2013-01-25 17:31:10
* updated to mm4icy last version
- Version 0.9.0.2 Date 2012-12-05 16:11:03
Corrected issues due to incompatibility.
Further work on blocks is necessary to ensure full compatibility, but this update should correct non implements functions errors.
- Version 0.9.0.1 Date 2012-06-26 14:16:20
Few corrections on SnapC and SnapZ.
- Version 0.9.0.0 Date 2012-06-25 17:03:41
snapSequence block removed. SnapZ and SnapC were added insteand.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-06-21 15:40:58
